a87fa682-cf9e-4730-91f3-c8a30eaca598.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

bee8819c-e400-413c-aa55-c921afa216f8.notes: Starting wealth is twice the average

fa068626-65e5-47c2-93dd-f8a522aaa1a0.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

aad4c30e-2aca-48e0-a068-8fba5f3461f4.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
aad4c30e-2aca-48e0-a068-8fba5f3461f4.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

14a009b8-42c8-471d-8abe-91c369d7db53.notes: 可携带 12 支 箭或矢
